name: The Fallen's Path - Game Jam 48 hours
name_original: The Fallen's Path - Game Jam 48 hours
description:
The Fallen's Path is a platformer game that was created for the FMU 48 Hour Game Jam. In this game, players take on the role of a demon who has lost all of their powers and must navigate through various levels to regain their strength by collecting souls. The ultimate goal is to reach the end of the game and engage in a fight against an angel.

This game features platforming and exploring as its main aspects, with gaining powers through out the levels as its gimmick of gaining powers throughout the levels, enhancing their gameplay experience by acquiring abilities such as a double jump or mid-air dash.

Another feature in this game is the freedom of what path you take first, where you can explore different routes and discover new abilities that can help you overcome obstacles and progress further.

  • Fabiano Oliveira : Programing, Game Design, Level Design
  • Fernando Oliveira : Level Art, Music, Audio
  • Ravy Santos : Art, Character Design
